description: Replacement porch wall in front elevation, Conversion of garage to habitable room, Replacement of garage door with window in front elevation,  Alterations to garage roof to raise height, Removal and replacement of windows in side elevation, Alterations to roof to form end gable and rear dormer, Roof lights in front roof slope, Replacement window in ground floor rear elevation,  Replacement windows in side and rear elevations of rear extension, External alterations
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
